caption.p: Optimization of primers and probes. The blue, red, yellow and orange amplification curves represent CPV(A), CCoV(B), CaKoV(C) and CAstV(D), respectively. The pale blue curve represents primer and probe concentrations of 0.2 μM and 0.05 μM. (For interpretation of the references to color in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the Web version of this article.)
